entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
